name: Brookie (Brownie + Cookie)
description: The perfect fusion between a brownie and a cookie in one delicious treat!

instructions.text: Cut the chocolate into large chunks, then place them in the fridge.
Cream the softened butter with the sugar and vanilla.
Mix in the flour combined with the salt and baking powder.
Finally, add the chocolate chunks and put everything back in the fridge.
Melt the chocolate with the butter using a bain-marie or the microwave. Smooth the mixture well.
Off the heat, add the sugar, then the eggs one by one. Finally, mix in the flour.
Pour the mixture into a buttered baking tin.
Remove the brownie from the oven and crumble the cookie dough over the top, covering the entire surface.
Bake for an additional 15‚Äì25 minutes, until the top is golden and cracked.
Let cool before cutting into squares and enjoying.

tips: Do not overbake! The centre should remain slightly soft for the best fudgy texture
Let cool completely before cutting for clean slices
You can add nuts (walnuts or pecans) to either layer for extra crunch
Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 4 days, or freeze for up to 3 months
For an extra indulgent treat, serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or custard
